infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to camera to scan barcodes
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to photo library to select images for barcode scanning

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you select images for barcode scanning.
plugins.cameraPermission: The app accesses your camera to let you take photos for barcode scanning.
